dict.acceptation: 几个的；专有的，独占的；各自的，各个的；不同的；

sent.orig: Several English the examination questions! Challenge the intelligence quotient coming! Can compose several making several!
sent.trans: 几道初三的英语题目！挑战智商的来！能做几道做几道！

sent.orig: A swept suite has several several bedrooms, a common area and a bathroom.
sent.trans: 一个套房有几个卧室，一个普通区域好一个洗漱间。

sent.orig: The interelectrode gap could be controlled only within several to several ten microns using this system.
sent.trans: 该系统能够将加工间隙控制到几微米到几十微米的范围内。

sent.orig: Several times she let me laugh, and several times I suffering runny nose.
sent.trans: 她几次让我开怀大笑，又几次让我痛苦流涕。

sent.orig: However, extensive prediction efforts in several countries in several eras all failed.
sent.trans: 然而，几个国家里地震预测方面的广泛努力在几个时代里均失败了。
